descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# “Let’s start a Journey! To our tomorrow!”

As a member of the renowned RUINSMAGUS Guild, your goal is to help strengthen it with magic, resources – and wisdom! – as you embark on more than 25 unique, story-driven quests. 
[media]


Face off against guardians tasked with protecting the ruins from intruders – and solve the deadly puzzles hidden within. When you've succeeded, head to the surface to acquire new items and upgrade your equipment in town – if you want to live another day, that is!
[media]

# Features
- Immersive VR mechanics bring the world to life.

- More than 25 story-driven quests to challenge your skills.

- Unleash 16 unique spells from the palm of your hand.

- Raise your shield with to block enemy attacks.

- Cast and blink your way through a stunning VR fantasy world.

- Equip new armor, gauntlets, and shields to stack the odds in your favor!
[media]
